metadata.title: CVE-2024-35792 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:crypto: rk3288 - Fix use after free in unprepareThe unprepare call must be carried out before the finalize callas the latter can free the request.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
